title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Quality Analysis Project for an Educational Video Repository

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze the structural characteristics of an educational video repository
Learners can statistically validate correlations between quality metrics such as video length, reuse rate, and interaction frequency
Learners can complete a project deriving learner engagement factors based on actual repository data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
